alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Gasconade (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:03AM CDT until July 20 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN CRAWFORD...SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHEASTERN GASCONADE COUNTIES... At 902 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Gerald, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sullivan, St. Clair, Owensville, Miramiguoa Park, Beaufort, St. Cloud, Noser Mill, Japan, Stanton, and Oak Hill. This also includes Meramec State Park. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 225 and 230. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
